title: The next champion, leaked in Riot China.
body:
"Boy... the world's one river, and I'm its King."
____
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/06/potential-champion-teaser-from-riot.html
____

#**RIVER KING**
The champion might have a devour ability.
Some people say it's going to be on his ultimate, like {{champion:31}}, I say it's going to be {{champion:20}}like. Long cooldown, magic damage devour, may also be an execute.

http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/395qnf/new_champion_leak_raatul_proof/

The ~~reddit~~ 4chan leak that came out a couple of weeks ago, mentioning a new champion with lore links to Varus and who wouldn't normally benefit with lifesteal does not match with this though. The reddit post also mentioned that he could be an ADC, but a devour ability wouldn't match up to that role right? It's very very odd indeed.

There is also this River Laugh in the PBE.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vJZlDVeDGMs

What do you guys think?

replies.body: The gambler... TWISTED FATE?!?{{champion:4}} hmm but I don't think TF is married
I thought it look like Gromp or am i mistaken ....
i think that the bride that was eating was TF's{{champion:4}} wife to be
by the look of it he will be a tank coz of how big he looks and will have a passive like {{champion:429}} because of the start and end you let me in he sed so im thinking along those lines
